snippet: A fireworks show over San Diego Bay lasted only about 20 seconds after a computer glitch caused multiple bulb-shaped explosions on the bay.
abstract: Computer glitch at the Fourth of July fireworks display over San Diego Bay causes tens of thousands of fireworks to go off simultaneously, reducing the 20 minute show to a matter of seconds.
lead_paragraph: A fireworks show over San Diego Bay lasted only about 20 seconds after a computer glitch caused multiple bulb-shaped explosions on the bay.

headline.seo: California: Computer Glitch Halts Firework Show
